text: The 2010–11 Liga IV Alba was the 43rd season of the Liga IV Alba, the fourth tier of the Romanian football league system. The season began on 21 August 2010 and ended on 5 June 2011. Performanța Ighiu became the county champion and will play a promotion play-off for Liga III. == Team changes == ===To Liga IV Alba=== Relegated from Liga III * — Promoted from Liga V Alba * CSO Cugir * Perla Jidvei * Europa Alba Iulia ===From Liga IV Alba=== Promoted to Liga III * — Relegated to Liga V Alba * CIL Blaj * Fortuna Lunca Mureșului * Balomir Acamriu ==League table== ==Promotion play-off== Champions of Liga IV – Alba County face champions of Liga IV – Arad County. |} Vladimirescu promoted to 2011–12 Liga III. ==See also== ===Main Leagues=== * 2010–11 Liga I * 2010–11 Liga II * 2010–11 Liga III ===County Leagues (Liga IV series)=== * 2010–11 Liga IV Arad * 2010–11 Liga IV Prahova * 2010–11 Liga IV Suceava * 2010–11 Liga IV Teleorman ==References== ==External links== * Official website Category:Sport in Alba County
title: 2010–11 Liga IV Alba
